verses.verse: Now Solomon <S%H8010><s%> purposed <S%H559><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> for the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and a house <S%H1004><s%> for his kingdom <S%H4438><s%>.

And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to Huram <S%H2361><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, As thou didst deal <S%H6213><s%> with David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, and didst send <S%H7971><s%> him cedars <S%H730><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> him a house <S%H1004><s%> to dwell therein <S%H3427><s%>, even so deal with me.

Behold <S%H1129><s%>, I am about to build a house <S%H1004><s%> for the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, to dedicate <S%H6942><s%> it to him <S%H6999><s%>, and to burn before <S%H6440><s%> him incense <S%H7004><s%> of sweet <S%H5561><s%> spices <S%H8548><s%>, and for the continual showbread <S%H4635><s%>, and for the burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> and evening <S%H6153><s%>, on the sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, and on the new moons <S%H2320><s%>, and on the set feasts <S%H4150><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>. And the house <S%H1004><s%> which I build <S%H1129><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%>; for great <S%H1419><s%> is our God <S%H430><s%> above all gods <S%H430><s%>.

But who is able <S%H6113><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> him a house <S%H1004><s%>, seeing heaven <S%H8064><s%> and the heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%> cannot contain <S%H3557><s%> him <S%H1129><s%>? who am I then, that I should build him a house <S%H1004><s%>, save only <S%H518><s%> to burn incense <S%H6999><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%>?

Then Huram <S%H2361><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> in writing <S%H3791><s%>, which he sent <S%H7971><s%> to Solomon <S%H8010><s%>, Because Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> loveth <S%H160><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, he hath made <S%H5414><s%> thee king over them <S%H4428><s%>.

Huram <S%H2361><s%> said <S%H559><s%> moreover <S%H1288><s%>, Blessed be Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>, who hath given <S%H5414><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> a wise <S%H2450><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, endued <S%H3045><s%> with discretion <S%H7922><s%> and understanding <S%H998><s%>, that should build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and a house <S%H1004><s%> for his kingdom <S%H4438><s%>.
And now I have sent <S%H7971><s%> a skilful <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, endued <S%H3045><s%> with understanding <S%H998><s%>, of Huram <S%H2361><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>'s,

the son <S%H1121><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>; and his father <S%H1><s%> was a man <S%H376><s%> of Tyre <S%H6876><s%>, skilful <S%H3045><s%> to work <S%H6213><s%> in gold <S%H2091><s%>, and in silver <S%H3701><s%>, in brass <S%H5178><s%>, in iron <S%H1270><s%>, in stone <S%H68><s%>, and in timber <S%H6086><s%>, in purple <S%H713><s%>, in blue <S%H8504><s%>, and in fine linen <S%H948><s%>, and in crimson <S%H3758><s%>, also to grave <S%H6605><s%> any manner of graving <S%H6603><s%>, and to devise <S%H2803><s%> any device <S%H4284><s%>; that there may be a place <S%H5414><s%> appointed unto him with thy skilful men <S%H2450><s%>, and with the skilful men <S%H2450><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%>.

Now therefore the wheat <S%H2406><s%> and the barley <S%H8184><s%>, the oil <S%H8081><s%> and the wine <S%H3196><s%>, which my lord <S%H113><s%> hath spoken <S%H559><s%> of <S%H7971><s%>, let him send unto his servants <S%H5650><s%>:

And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> numbered <S%H5608><s%> all the sojourners <S%H582><s%> that were in the land <S%H776><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, after <S%H310><s%> the numbering <S%H5610><s%> wherewith David <S%H1732><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> had numbered <S%H5608><s%> them <S%H4672><s%>; and they were found a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.
